languages.text: "Поверь, {name}, на этих людей можно положиться. В темнейший час они нашли источник решимости в вере, и каждый из них готов отдать жизнь за правое дело. А многие — уже отдали".

"Trust me, {name}, these people can be relied upon. In their darkest hour, they found a source of resolve in faith, and each among them is ready to give their life for their righteous cause. Many already have."
languages.original_text: "Поверь, {name}, на этих людей можно положиться. В темнейший час они нашли источник решимости в вере, и каждый из них готов отдать жизнь за правое дело. А многие — уже отдали".

traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “相信我，{name}，这些人都很可靠。在人生中最黑暗的时刻，他们都在信仰中找到了决心的源泉。他们之中的每个人都愿意为正义的事业献出生命，而且很多人已经壮烈牺牲了。”
languages.original_text: "Trust me, {name}, these people can be relied upon. In their darkest hour, they found a source of resolve in faith, and each among them is ready to give their life for their righteous cause. Many already have."

traits.locale_text: “相信我，{name}，这些人都很可靠。在人生中最黑暗的时刻，他们都在信仰中找到了决心的源泉。他们之中的每个人都愿意为正义的事业献出生命，而且很多人已经壮烈牺牲了。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「みな信頼できる者たちばかりです、{name}様。彼らは暗闇の中でも信仰に決意の源を見いだし、ひとりひとりが正義の大義のために命を捧げる覚悟ができています。すでにその命を全うした者もいます」
languages.original_text: "Trust me, {name}, these people can be relied upon. In their darkest hour, they found a source of resolve in faith, and each among them is ready to give their life for their righteous cause. Many already have."

traits.locale_text: 「みな信頼できる者たちばかりです、{name}様。彼らは暗闇の中でも信仰に決意の源を見いだし、ひとりひとりが正義の大義のために命を捧げる覚悟ができています。すでにその命を全うした者もいます」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Créame, {name}, puede confiar en esta gente. En su momento más bajo, encontraron una fuente de determinación en su fe, y todos ellos están dispuestos a dar su vida por esta causa tan noble. Muchos ya lo han hecho».
languages.original_text: "Trust me, {name}, these people can be relied upon. In their darkest hour, they found a source of resolve in faith, and each among them is ready to give their life for their righteous cause. Many already have."

traits.locale_text: «Créame, {name}, puede confiar en esta gente. En su momento más bajo, encontraron una fuente de determinación en su fe, y todos ellos están dispuestos a dar su vida por esta causa tan noble. Muchos ya lo han hecho».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Trust me, , these people can be relied upon. In their darkest hour, they found a source of resolve in faith, and each among them is ready to give their life for their righteous cause. Many already have."

languages.text: « Croyez-moi, {name}, tous ces gens sont parfaitement fiables. Dans leurs heures les plus sombres, leur foi leur a donné la détermination de ne pas baisser les bras, et chacun d'entre eux est prêt à donner sa vie pour notre cause. Beaucoup l'ont d'ailleurs déjà fait. »
languages.original_text: "Trust me, {name}, these people can be relied upon. In their darkest hour, they found a source of resolve in faith, and each among them is ready to give their life for their righteous cause. Many already have."

traits.locale_text: « Croyez-moi, {name}, tous ces gens sont parfaitement fiables. Dans leurs heures les plus sombres, leur foi leur a donné la détermination de ne pas baisser les bras, et chacun d'entre eux est prêt à donner sa vie pour notre cause. Beaucoup l'ont d'ailleurs déjà fait. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Glaubt mir, {name}, auf diese Leute ist Verlass. In ihrer dunkelsten Stunde haben sie im Glauben einen Ausweg gefunden, und sie alle sind bereit, für die rechtschaffene Sache ihr Leben zu geben. Und viele haben das bereits getan."
languages.original_text: "Trust me, {name}, these people can be relied upon. In their darkest hour, they found a source of resolve in faith, and each among them is ready to give their life for their righteous cause. Many already have."

traits.locale_text: "Glaubt mir, {name}, auf diese Leute ist Verlass. In ihrer dunkelsten Stunde haben sie im Glauben einen Ausweg gefunden, und sie alle sind bereit, für die rechtschaffene Sache ihr Leben zu geben. Und viele haben das bereits getan."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Güven bana {name}, bu insanlara sırtını yaslayabilirsin. En kötü zamanlarında inançla doğru yolu buldular. Her biri, haklı davamız için can vermeye hazır. Birçoğu hâlihazırda verdi bile."
languages.original_text: "Trust me, {name}, these people can be relied upon. In their darkest hour, they found a source of resolve in faith, and each among them is ready to give their life for their righteous cause. Many already have."

traits.locale_text: "Güven bana {name}, bu insanlara sırtını yaslayabilirsin. En kötü zamanlarında inançla doğru yolu buldular ve her biri, haklı davamız için can vermeye hazır. Birçoğumuz zaten verdi."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
